title: Maintenance work on the Punggol LRT system

title_translations.zh-Hans: 榜鹅轻轨系统维修工程
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan di sistem Punggol LRT

updates.text:
We will be conducting maintenance work on the Punggol LRT system this Sunday, 29 April 2018. 
‍‍‍‍‍‍ ‍‍
Train service will be available as usual at all stations, but only in one direction. Service in the opposite direction will start at 7am. https://t.co/bKmxBmwbua
